MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL18 postcode area of Rhyl, affecting properties in Oaklea Court, Pendre Avenue and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of continued repairs and location of a secondary fault on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11AM via generator. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.53AM on 28th October 2020.
